stimulusHtml: Find the particular solution y = f(x) to the differential equation dy/dx = 4x − 2xy with the initial condition f(0) = 5.

features.html: Let f be the function satisfying f′(x) = 4x − 2x f(x) for all real numbers x, with f(0) = 5 and \(\displaystyle \lim_{x\to\infty}f\left(x\right)=2\).
